phrs.translation: 妨碍, 阻碍, 阻止, 有碍
妨碍交通, 阻碍交通
阻扰, 牵制, 的词根是
妨碍, 削弱, 阻碍

sentences.sentence: At no time did I make an attempt to impede any investigatory effort.
sentences.translation: 我从未试图妨碍任何调查的努力。
一个人不应该妨碍他人进步。

sentences.sentence: There is a "risk of strangulation" if metal fasteners impede the flow of sap.
sentences.translation: 如果金属固件阻碍了树液的流动，将会有“窒息”的风险。
